trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> An especially fatherly looking Mord needs your help to solve an unusual quandary.
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the paternal Mord.
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the paternal Mord again.
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_TODO_02<tab>Retrieve the twinkling gemstone.
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the twinkling gemstone to the Mord youngling.
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDFATHER03490_000_000<tab>It is a dire emergency! Dire indeed! You must help!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDFATHER03490_000_001<tab>Follow me, I will explain everything!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDMOTHER03490_000_010<tab>What ever shall we do!?
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDCHILD03490_000_011<tab>My most prized possession... I am lost without it!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDFATHER03490_000_020<tab>Hear my plea, noble traveler!

TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDFATHER03490_000_021<tab>My son was playing with his favorite gemstone and somehow it ended up on that balcony up there. I told him “If it is so precious, you should stop throwing it around like that,” but alas, my words fell on deaf ears!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDCHILD03490_000_022<tab>It looked so pretty, spinning through the air! Oh, how it sparkled!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDFATHER03490_000_023<tab>Enough of that, you fool! Ahem. As you can see, it is too high for any of us Mord to reach. We are simply not built for such acrobatics!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDFATHER03490_000_024<tab>I have a feeling you would fare better. This way, please!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDMOTHER03490_000_030<tab>My poor boy... What did he do to deserve such awful luck?
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDCHILD03490_000_031<tab>I would do anything to get my gemstone, but Mother says, “No jumping off of cliffs!”
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDFATHER03490_000_040<tab>With your strong legs, you should be able to reach the roof by jumping from that plank over there.
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDFATHER03490_000_041<tab>Though the endeavor may be fraught with peril, you must get my son's gemstone back, or I shall never hear the end of it!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDFATHER03490_000_050<tab>You might need a burst of speed first, although there is much room on that plank. Do whatever it takes!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDFATHER03490_000_060<tab>The gemstone! Quickly, take it to my son before he suffers any longer!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDMOTHER03490_000_061<tab>You have the stone? Please, I beg you, give it to my boy!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDCHILD03490_000_070<tab>Where is my gemstone!?
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDCHILD03490_000_071<tab>Ah! I thought I would never see it again! I am so happy!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDCHILD03490_000_072<tab>Father gave this to me. See how it shines!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDCHILD03490_000_073<tab>I wanted to see it twinkling from above, like a star!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDMOTHER03490_000_080<tab>But if you want to see stars, you need only look to the night sky.
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDMOTHER03490_000_090<tab>Even so, you must not throw it!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDCHILD03490_000_100<tab>...Yes, Mother. You are right. This is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> star! I shall keep it with me, always.
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDMOTHER03490_000_101<tab>Though we may never be able to repay your kindness, honorable stranger, please accept this as a token of our gratitude!
TEXT_LUCKZG005_03490_MORDCHILD03490_000_102<tab>I will never forget you!
